anthropic_api_key.title: Anthropic API Key
anthropic_api_key.description: The Anthropic Admin API key to access the usage report API.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data from the last N days if start_date is not specified.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Number of records to fetch per API request

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the API

retries.title: Max Number of Retries
retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the API.

retry_delay.title: Retry Delay
retry_delay.description: The time to wait before retrying a request that errored with a a gateway timeout (in milliseconds).

backfill.title: Backfill
backfill.description: Backfill data from the start date to the end date.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data (YYYY-MM-DD format).

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date to stop syncing data (YYYY-MM-DD format).
